pages.text: $(l)Active powers/$ are powers that only have effect when used, which normally has a cost. They are represented by a square icon, different from the common circle.

To use an active power, equip it by clicking one of the slots numbered with roman numbers, and then click the power to be equipped. Then, during the game, press CTRL + the number of the chosen slot, to use it. This key can be changed in the game settings.
